entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:36 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
